nodes.description: 警方于周一晚10:35接报曼彻斯特竞技场发生爆炸
nodes.support_text: Greater Manchester Police said they were called to the Manchester Arena in England just before 10:35 p.m. local time on Monday.

nodes.description: 初步统计22人死亡59人受伤，事件被定性为可能恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: 22 dead, 59 injured after reports of explosion at Ariana Grande concert at Manchester Arena: Police

nodes.description: 爆炸发生在演唱会结束后的场馆外厅，目击者听到巨响后人群慌乱逃生
nodes.support_text: The explosion happened inside of the arena’s foyer area after the concert finished, according to witnesses, who reported hearing a loud bang as they exited the arena.

nodes.description: 曼彻斯特维多利亚车站被紧急疏散，火车服务暂停
nodes.support_text: Manchester Victoria station has been evacuated and trains are unable to run.

nodes.description: 英国运输警察在全国铁路枢纽及列车加强武装巡逻
nodes.support_text: British Transport Police department said extra officers would be patrol at 'key railway stations as well as on trains around the country’ in the wake of the attack.

nodes.description: 英国首相与工党领袖宣布暂停大选竞选活动
nodes.support_text: May and Corbyn have agreed that all national campaigning in the General Election were 'suspended until further notice' in the aftermath of the incident.

nodes.description: 美国执法部门获知初步推测为自杀式爆炸
nodes.support_text: U.S. law enforcement officials have been informed that the leading theory is that the Manchester Arena incident was the work of a suicide bomber.

nodes.description: 6家医院接收伤者，警长呼吁公众保持警惕
nodes.support_text: The wounded are being treated at six different hospitals, Greater Manchester Police Chief Constable Ian Hopkins said in a press conference.

nodes.description: 美国国务院表示关注事件并慰问受害者
nodes.support_text: The U.S. State Department said that it was monitoring the situation closely.

nodes.description: Ariana Grande通过社交媒体宣布自己安全但心碎
nodes.support_text: Grande's manager, Scooter Braun, echoed her tweet, writing, 'Our hearts are broken.'

nodes.description: 竞技场方确认爆炸发生在场馆外部并致歉
nodes.support_text: Manchester Arena confirmed that there had been an incident but said it occurred outside the venue.

nodes.description: Greater Manchester Police通报了接警时间
nodes.support_text: Greater Manchester Police said they were called to the Manchester Arena in England just before 10:35 p.m. local time on Monday.

nodes.description: 当局要求人们避开该区域
nodes.support_text: Authorities are telling people to avoid the area. At the moment, the incident is being treated as a 'terrorist incident until police know otherwise,' police said.

nodes.description: 执法人员谨慎表示信息是初步的
nodes.support_text: 执法人员谨慎表示信息是初步的

nodes.description: 高级执法人员被调查简报
nodes.support_text: 高级执法人员被调查简报

nodes.description: 我们正在尽力做所有能做的

edges.support_text: British Transport Police department said extra officers would be patrol at 'key railway stations as well as on trains around the country’ in the wake of the attack.
May is set to hold an emergency COBRA meeting at 9 a.m. local time.
U.S. law enforcement officials have been informed that the leading theory is that the Manchester Arena incident was the work of a suicide bomber.
The wounded are being treated at six different hospitals.
Authorities are telling people to avoid the area. At the moment, the incident is being treated as a 'terrorist incident until police know otherwise,' police said.

Eyewitness Karen Ford told the BBC, 'The lights had come up everyone was just getting out and walking towards the stairs, when all of a sudden this huge sound, which sounded like an explosion went off.'
Manchester Victoria station has been evacuated and trains are unable to run.
Manchester Arena confirmed that there had been an incident but said it occurred outside the venue.
英国运输警察部门先宣布增加警力巡逻，随后助理首席警监Robin Smith具体说明
The U.S. State Department said that it was monitoring the situation closely.
Grande's manager, Scooter Braun, echoed her tweet, writing, 'Our hearts are broken.'
The police report (node_1) temporally follows the official statement (node_12) based on temporal_order 2 vs 4.
Evacuation orders (node_13) precede the explosion confirmation (node_1) as per temporal_order 6.
官方表态后通勤者产生预期
预期产生后具体分类警员类型
